title: Interpretable SHAP-bounded Bayesian Optimization for Underwater Acoustic Metamaterial Coating Design
author: Hansani Weeratunge (Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology), Dominic M. Robe (The University of Melbourne), Elnaz Hajizadeh (The University of Melbourne), ...
relevance_why: This paper combines Bayesian optimization with SHAP analysis, which could inform and enhance predictive modeling in sound generation tasks, particularly in understanding how design variables affect acoustic performance.
background: Optimizing the sound absorption performance of polyurethane coatings embedded with voids requires efficient navigation through complex design parameters.
contribution: This paper introduces an interpretability-informed Bayesian optimization framework that utilizes SHapley Additive exPlanations to refine design parameters for underwater acoustic coatings, resulting in improved acoustic performance.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Traditional optimization methods in material design often rely on brute-force techniques that can be inefficient, particularly in high-dimensional spaces.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work integrates machine learning interpretability to dynamically adjust optimization search spaces, thereby increasing efficiency without requiring additional simulations.

key_innovation: Combines SHAP analysis with Bayesian optimization to enhance the interpretability of design influences and streamline multi-dimensional optimization processes.
real_world_impact: This approach could significantly improve the design and deployment of acoustic metamaterials, enhancing applications in naval architecture and underwater acoustics.
limitations: The approach may still be limited by the representativeness of the initial data and the complexity of the material behavior not captured in the model.

new_terms.SHapley Additive exPlanations (SHAP): **SHAP** is an interpretability method based on cooperative game theory that provides insights into the contribution of individual features to model predictions.
new_terms.Bayesian Optimization: **Bayesian Optimization** is a probabilistic model-based method for optimizing expensive black-box functions by balancing exploration and exploitation strategies.
